Scriptal.Name: Set Alert Route
Scriptal.Description:
Updates the route that the NPC patrols while in the alert (combat) phase. Compatible with soldiers, helicopters and UAVs.
- For most events, 'arg1' represents the GameObjectId that sent the event. For GeoTraps, 'arg2' is the GameObjectId that entered/exited.

Choice.Name: Enemy Game Object
Choice.Description: The soldier/helicopter (their name or GameObjectId) to be updated

Choice.Name: Alert Route
Choice.Description: The name of the route that the NPC will patrol during the alert phase.
